title: Allow comments in Streaming Expressions
description:
Now that Streaming Expressions supports variables and data structures it would be great to support comments. Here is the proposed syntax:


# comment above...

let(
      # Start of line comment
      a=random(....),
    
      # Start of line comment
      b=random(...) 
   )

# comment below
